Our Vision

We believe that every child deserves a better chance in living, which only starts at their education journey, with our Interactive virtual reality cognitive rehabilitation educational game, we are one step closer to making the learning experience of Down syndrome children Interactive smooth, and more fun.

Virtual Enviroment

improving their independence and interaction with society

paragraph about new learning tech

New Learning Tech

VR has a positive effect on childrenâ€™s memory and brain plasticity

About Us

We are students in biomedical engineering, Cairo University. This is our graduation project which is cognitive rehabilitation using virtual reality for children with Down syndrome. We're enthuastic to make a world for down syndrome children where they have a better education, hence a better chance of living.
